title: Weird lag issue

embed.description: Uploaded by Thomas the Cock on 2016-09-26.

body:
Hi. I've had this issue for a while, but i've just learned to live with it, because it hasn't been so bad, but lately it's become crippling. There are certain matches i cant even bear to finish, and some games it only happens 1-2 times, it is so inconsistent, i really need some help. I should also say i only have this problem in online games, my internet works fine otherwise and i have a wired connection, ethernet, and as you can see i have around 30 ping the entire time, and everyone else is walking around like normal, it's so strange. I've linked to a video showing my issue, there is also 2 clips from CS:GO there because i have this issue there as well, but feel free to skip that part. 
I would really, really appreciate any help, this is driving me crazy. Thank you so much in advance

replies.body:
This looks like the direct result of packet loss on the way to the server. In this case, it looks like a combination of upstream and downstream packets. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are properly configured for League by following our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change in these issues.
gosh that's odd, its almost as if your upstream and only upstream traffic is being lagged.
